title: Use port specified in connection when running CheckHostAlive
author: bkbartk
body_snippet:
Hi, 

I made some changes but I'm not allowed to push them, so here are the details.
at the moment for hostAlive mRemoteNG does a ping,
in my own fork back then I changed this to connect to the used port because most servers do not allow ping anymore.
and I'm planning to backport some of the changes I made to mRemoteNG starting with this one.
in mRemoteV1\UI\Window\ConfigWindow.cs
method CheckHostAlive
should be changed like this
`
        private string _hostName;
        private int...

comments.snippet: Makes sense. We should be able to get this in pretty easily
comments.author: sparerd
